text:
When I use tomcat4 servlet,I set charset to GBK or utf-8 ,the servlet is 
working correctly,the request.setCharacterEncoding("GBK") and 
request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8") is also working correctly,but when I 
using jsp ,It is not working correctly, the request.setCharacterEncoding("GBK") 
and request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8") is also working incorrectly.
I think the encoding "GBK" you may set to "gb2312","utf-8" is working 
incorrectly beacuse your reader's encoding is set to "utf-8",so he can't find 
input file
creator: dragzhb@163.net

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1944 ***
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
